phrases: It is time for the ever-popular segment...
Let us start with the first postcard.
We have been ordered to capture Lord Zeref and to wipe out Fairy Tail.
P.S. I would rather have more Gray-san and less Hikaru.
In the last episode, Lucy figured out the location of Master Mavis's grave,
but Cana put her to sleep for some reason.
It is all oh crap! and stuff.
One of the 7 Kin of Purgatory?
What did you do with her?
I really do not know, but what does it matter?
What is that supposed to mean?
Because you are going to die here.
Did I get separated from Cana somehow?
I do not know what is going on!
But I have to do something about this guy.
You can give me all the evil eye you want!
I are not scared or nothing.
Because I am Kain Hikaru, one of the 7 Kin of Purgatory of Grimoire Heart.
It does not matter how powerful you are!
What is important is that you have stood against our guild!
I will take you on, so come at me!
It is all like, bristly here...
Is not that your own hair?
Whoa, this guy's a piece of work.
I will show you my magic, Visit at the Ox Hour!
Even the name gives me the creeps...
Now then, hand over one of your hairs.
Visit at the Ox Hour needs one of your hairs!
If I stick your hair into Mr. Cursey here, I can move you exactly how I wish!
It is an extremely powerful curse magic!
That makes me even less likely to give it to you!
Do not tell me you just realized this!
But wait, I have never heard of magic like that.
That is got to be a bluff.
No, the doll's name is Mr. Cursey.
No, bluff means that you are exaggerating and you cannot really do it.
Did I just hit a nerve I should not have?
If you think so, why do not you try it?
Stick it into Mr. Cursey, and...
A bristle is a coarse, dry hair.
Cannot you feel the extreme magic power?
Feel free to hug it or kiss it!
Actually, I am a little hungry...
Three embarrassing pin-up poses in a row!
You are enjoying this, are not you?
Even if you ask me to go out with you, it is too late!
When did we change to a soap opera?
From now on, I am cold-hearted!
I do not have time to play around, either!
Why do I also get these types?
Gate of the Golden Bull, I open thee!
And one of the 12 Zodiac Gates?
How dare you attack Lucy-san with that lascivious look on your face!
Taurus, show him what one of the strongest Spirits in the Spirit World can do!
This time I am going to finish it good!
I lost... in a battle of power?
That cow-looking thing's made me even hungrier!
He is even stronger without magic!
Gate of the Centaur, I open thee!
Furthermore, I am not a food source, as it were-moshimoshi!
Gate of the Scorpion, I open thee!
Anyway, I am on vacation with Aquarius right now.
I will finish this up quick and get right back to her, yeah!
I am a little scared about afterwards, though.
I am not jealous in the slightest, got it?
Show me some tastier Spirits than this sandy scorpion, okay?
If sand will not work, I do not have any reason to be here.
Mr. Cursey still has my hair in him.
So if I change the material that Mr. Cursey is made out of...
I might not look like it, but I am one of the 7 Kin of Purgatory...
In that case, a Spirit like this might actually work.
Gate of the Lesser Dog, I open thee!
People say I am cute, but this guy's at another level!
You do not call me much, so I would thought you would forgotten about me-ebi.
So, how would you like your hair-ebi?
You really do not get the situation, do you?
Why is he readying a pot of boiling water-ebi?
Whatever, just give him such an embarrassing cut he cannot show his head in public!
My bristles are not so weak.
Now that is some crazy hair-ebi!
I am going to cause you trouble...
I never thought that you... were a burden.
Can I leap into your arms?
You have always been such a baby...
We might have just met, but...
Where did you get such acting chops?
All men are simpletons, so you can be of help to Lucy this way.
Is my devotion such a burden?!
My Spirit combo's been wiped out!
I am going to get serious now.
Change Mr. Cursey's material to cotton!
I will finish you with this!
That did not work on me at all.
I have got to pay you back for Galuna Island.
Beating you too quickly would be boring.
Play with me a little longer, would you?
She is way stronger than she was before!
I did not use even half of my power back then.
But thanks to it, I am saved.
Lucy came flyin' in from over there... real ugly-like.
Is there any other way to get sent flying?
Kain, what are you doing here?
Even Natsu's having a hard time.
I am going to beat her!
But, there are two enemies now.
But there are two of us now, too.
For now, let us forget we are rivals in the exam...
This combination brings back the memories...
Makes you remember the time we met.
They are like some happy couple!
They are like some happy-go-lucky couple!
Ultear-san, these people are not worth your time to fight!
I can beat them both myself!
Just me, and I can handle them!
Then it will not be 2 on 2!
Personally, I would rather it be 2 on 1...
Everyone is completely forgetting about me...
Then I will leave them to you.
I have to take Zeref to Master Hades, after all.
We cannot let them have Zeref!
There is this World of Great Magic thing or whatever...
And I still have to pay him back for my scarf.
I cannot let them have'i am'til I punch his face in!
If you feel like showing them just how powerful the 7 Kin of Purgatory are,
no one can stand up to you.
I will not betray your trust, Ultear-san!
I can do it when it counts!
Guess I will beat this guy first!
Then I will go after her...
I plucked a hair when you were running away.
With that hair, you and Mr. Cursey are now one!
You are now completely under my control!
What the heck is going on?
Looks like those two get along.
More than friends, but less than lovers.
Three embarrassing pin-up poses in a row!
You are enjoying this, are not you?
Lucy is made to move exactly like that doll!
Just like it says, it is a Lost Magic where you curse your opponent and attack them.
The Lullaby Flute that Natsu and the others once fought is another example.
Depending on how it is used, Kain Hikaru's Mr. Cursey could well spell doom for the world!
It is truly a fearsome magic, probably!
It is not fun for me!
How about you beat up your pal?
Natsu's getting beaten up by Lucy...
And we are not even in Edolas...
What the hell was that for, Lucy?
It is not me doing it!
I am sorry, I am sorry!
This is more annoying than I thought.
Do you get more powerful when you are under that thing's control?
What the hell are you doing with her?
If you want to do funny business with me watching, do it like this!
Hug him until his bones break!
Hold him to the bone so he can never get away!
Pump him so full of your feelings he flies into the sky!
The power of Visit at the Ox Hour is far more than this.
Next, tragedy will befall the two...
Mr. Cursey, where did you go?
Natsu, Lucy, I stole his doll!
What the hell is this guy?
He is the opposite of how he looks!
You think an official guild can actually beat Grimoire Heart?!
I will get Virgo to free you!
I have run out of magic power now?
Now watch as I finish her off.
Not if I can help it!
Take this, and that, and this, and that!
He is a lot stronger than he looks!
I will handle him somehow, so run!
It is always more fun when we are together!
I will crush that cute little face of yours flat.
I will do this right at once.
M-My body's moving on its own!
You are bending my body too much!
Able to move her body freely, without restraint!
Ultimate Lucy is on the scene!
Natsu, please keep my joints in mind,'kay?
I just had an even better idea!
Iron Fist... of the Fire Dragon!
It is not hot for the person using it!
I am going to die here!
Um, is there a reason my entire body is on fire now?!
By combining Natsu's fire powers with Happy's speed,
through Mr. Cursey, Lucy became a flaming ball of magic power,
which landed a direct hit on Kain Hikaru.
You are going to retire before doing anything the slightest bit productive?
You just have a knack for drilling a hole right into the heart, you know that?
I was just letting everyone else have their time in the sun, you see?
Yeah, thanks a bunch for that.
Just so you know, I have not even gotten serious yet!
Sure, fine, hurry up and be awesome then.
